item.title: Some Gists
item.description: Link Collection for my own personal use Github ‘Gists’ are code samples that are too short for, or not worth creating a new standalone repository. For example One-off scripts unfinished/half-working scripts forked github gists from other people copies of codesamples from other people, slightly edited or customized This webpage is just for my own personal use, a reminder for myself. For now, I list only the links to the gists.
